item.title: The loss of ||kabbo's tobacco bag, which was stolen by a hungry dog, belonging to !gou !nui, named 'Blom'
item.summary: An account of how ||kabbo's tobacco pouch was stolen by a dog ('Blom') while he slept at night, and of the subsequent search for it.
item.comments: 1) p.6137v: see ||kabbo's song on the loss of his tobacco pouch; see The names of |kaggen's wife, son and daughter, 2) This story is found in Book VIII-1
